page.title: 10Paula's Day in Markinch
page.content: Markinch School has 200 pupils.We have a headmaster and an assistant head for the early years.There are 8 teachers and visiting teachers for drama,art and music.A typical day starts at 9:00am with our teachers reading us a Bible story.Then we do our maths and arithmetic.Sometimes we then go to watch a television programme.When we come back we discuss it with the teacher.After interval we do an English exercise.Sometimes after that we have a spelling test.We sit in groups.The noisy ones sit on their own.At 12:45 we go home for lunch.At 1:45 pm we go into the school.We have a film or maybe gym.Then teacher reads us a bit of our story called "The Island of Blue Dolphins".At 3:15 we go home.
